task.title: How To Make Pancakes
task.shortdesc: This document will show you how to make pancakes using a frying pan.

taskbody.context: When you've finished reading this document you will know how to make delicious pancakes
taskbody.prereq: You will need a good mixing bowl

step.cmd: Measure out 4oz of flour and add to a mixing bowl

choices.choice: Use white flour if you have no allergies
Use gluen free flour if you are allergic to gluten

substep.cmd: Crack the eggs off the side if your bowl
Carefully pour the egg contents into your mixture

step.steptroubleshooting: Be sure no shell from your egg is in your mixture

step.cmd: Add a dash of lime to flavour
step.info: A fresh lemon is better, but you can use juice if you do not have a fresh lemon

step.cmd: Add 300ml of milk and mix everything
step.stepresult: The mixture shoukd not be thick and smooth

taskbody.result: The Pancake is now ready to eat
taskbody.postreq: Be sure to clean up after you
